site_name: Land At Southmere Village, Binsey Walk, Tavy Bridge, Southmere Drive And Mere Road Adjacent To Harrow Manorway And Yarnton Way, London.
description: Details of conditions (Phase 1B) 39 (piling) and 64 (Piling Method Statement) pursuant to planning permission ref. 16/01251/FULM for the demolition of existing buildings/hard standing, residential development of 525 units and 3691 sqm (GIA) of commercial floorspace with flexible uses across classes A1-A3 (retail, financial/professional services, cafe/restaurants), B1a (office), D1 (Non-residential institutions) and D2 (assembly and leisure) and associated works including informal and formal open space; internal road network; landscaping; car and cycle parking; waste storage
